name: Iron Glove Laser Simulator
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Laser.
Iron Glove Laser Simulator - a game simulator joke app, where you can play with the phone as an iron glove! Are you a fan of robots? Like beautiful special effects? Then this is the app for you! With this application you can listen to the sound of the laser on the glove, to see the beautiful animation and do not hurt yourself and loved ones! Make yourself the coolest image of the robot!
Warning game joke created for pranks, jokes, and absolutely safe for your health!
Download the game for free now and play anywhere without an internet connection!
Thank you for choosing our game! Leave us feedback and we will try to make them even better for you!
